Interface IProblemRepresentation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Property
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobShopPreferenceListRep
    public interface IProblemRepresentation
extends Property
    Interface for the problem representation classes Is also an interchangeable property

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomRep

        <T extends IProblem> Chromosome createRandomRep​(T problem)
        Creates a random chromosome for the problem
        Parameters:
        problem - The problem for which a chromosome shall be generated
        Returns:
        The random chromosome

      • createSolutionFromChromosome

        ISolution createSolutionFromChromosome​(Chromosome rep,
                                       IProblem problem)
                                throws Exception
        Decodes the chromosome rep into a solution of the given problem.
        Parameters:
        rep - The chromosome to be decoded
        problem - The problem holding helper structures and constraints for the decoding
        Returns:
        The decoded chromosome
        Throws:
        Exception - If the decoding process crashes something is wrong with the chromosome

      • repairChromosome

        void repairChromosome​(Chromosome chromosome)
               throws CannotRepairException
        Repairs a broken chromosome to be normally repaired
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The broken chromosome
        Throws:
        CannotRepairException - If the chromosome is to broken and can't be repaired
